reviews.text: Have selected a room with balcony. Enjoyed staying 3 nights. It is in the centre. The price including good breakfast in the garden. All other hotels stayed during my trips were without breakfast except this one.
reviews.title: Nice comforable hotel
Great little hotel at a reasonable price
reviews.text: Found this gem in Conde Nast Traveler. There were 3 of us and it offered triples (three single beds, very comfortable). I believe we paid 139 euros during June. Extremely large garden room - I don't remember the room # but it was the first garden room by the front door. Bathroom was spacious and had a half-door for shower but no holder for the shower head. That is the only reason I gave this a 4 rather than a 5.

reviews.title: Excellent place to stay
reviews.text: It was very quiet in our room, I heard no noise at all. There is a 24-hour reception desk, good for any late nights you may have. The hotel is within walking distance of the Croisette, which is the main shopping and beach street and is around the corner from many different restaurants.
